title: Preview - One Line
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
There is a game in the Pregame state AND set to one line
custom_steps:
WHEN
The user navigates to Scoreboard List View
custom_expected:
THEN
the following elements should be displayed:
https://zpl.io/VQQjp6x
 - Game label text is displayed in One Line
 - Team Logos
 - Team Code
 - Team Records
 - First Pitch Gametime (local time zone support)
 - Probable Pitchers and Stats

title: Ability to see "Pregame & delayed" state on the scoreboard
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ANDROID-9212
As a user, I want the scoreboard to show me when a game is in a “pregrame & delayed state” so that I know why the game hasn’t started yet.
custom_steps: GIVEN a game is in pregame, AND the game has any delayed start,
custom_expected: THEN we should render start time and “Delayed” text

There is a game in the Live state
custom_steps:
WHEN
The user navigates to Scoreboard List View
custom_expected:
THEN
the following elements should be displayed:
https://zpl.io/VQQjp6x
 - Game label is displayed in One Line
 - Linescore
 - Scores
 - Bases
 - Pitch Count
 - Outs
 - Inning
 - Pitcher/Batter Matchup

title: Ability to see "Warmup" state on Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ANDROID-9215
As a user, I want the scoreboard to show me that the game is in a warmup state, so that I know the game is about to begin.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in warmup
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display Warmup status text.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in warmup
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display empty bases.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in warmup
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display RHE

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in warmup
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display Count/Outs

title: Ability to see "In Progress" state on the Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ANDROID-9213
As a user, I want the scoreboard to show me the In Progress state(s), so that I know what is happening with a game that has already started. When a game is in progress, I also want to know other relevant information about game play.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display Inning

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display bases

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display RHE

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display Count/Outs

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in progress
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the client should display Pitcher/Batter matchup

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN the game is in progress, 
WHEN there is a challenge,

GIVEN the game is in progress, 
WHEN there is a no hitter,

GIVEN the game is in progress, 
WHEN there is a perfect game,

title: Final
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
There is a game in the Final state
custom_steps:
WHEN
The user navigates to Scoreboard List View
custom_expected:
THEN
the following elements should be displayed:
https://zpl.io/VQQjp6x
 - Final text displays
 - Winning/Losing/Save Pitcher
 - Final Score
 - Updated Team Records
 - Complete linescore for all innings played

title: Ability to see a game is "Final" on the Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ANDROID-9217
As a user, I want the scoreboard to show me that a game is FINAL so that I can understand it’s completed.

custom_steps_separated.content: GIVEN a game is in a Game Over State,
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the state should be mapped to “Final”

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a game is Final, 

WHEN the game completed in 9 innings,

GIVEN a game is Final, 

WHEN the game completed in NOT 9 innings,

GIVEN the game is Final, 

WHEN there is a no hitter,

GIVEN the game is Final, 

WHEN there is a perfect game,

title: Ability to see "Suspended" state(s) on Scoreboard
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ANDROID-9169
As a user I want to see games in a suspended state on the day the game is suspended and also would like to see when the game is resumed.

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date matches the resume date,

Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date matches the resume date,

Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date matches the resume date,

Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date matches the resume date,

Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date does not match the resume date,

Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date does not match the resume date,

Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date does not match the resume date,

Given the game is in progress AND suspended, 
when the scoreboard date does not match the resume date AND the resume date is set,

There is a game that is in the Final state AND the user has navigated to Scoreboard Card View AND the user has scrolled to the top of the page
custom_steps:
WHEN
The user switches view to Compact View
custom_expected:
THEN
The following elements should be displayed:
https://zpl.io/VQQjp6x
- Winning/Losing/Save Pitcher
- Final Score
- Updated Team Records
- Complete linescore for all innings played

title: Preview Game State
custom_preconds:
Preview Game State (use Stringer tool, https://stringer-qa.bamgrid.com)
GIVEN a user is on the Scoreboard Card View
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in a Preview state
custom_expected:
THEN the "Gameday" and "Tickets" links will display under the game data 
AND the Gameday link opens up Gameday for the relevant game

title: Live Game State
custom_preconds:
Live Game State (use Stringer tool, https://stringer-qa.bamgrid.com)
GIVEN a user is on the Scoreboard Card View
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in a Live state
custom_expected:
THEN the "MLB.TV, "Audio", "Gameday", "Box" will display under the game data
AND the MLB.TV link will play the home feed of the game
AND the Gameday link will open up Gameday for the game
AND the Box link will open up the Box Score in Gameday

title: Final Game State
custom_preconds:
Final Game State (use Stringer tool, https://stringer-qa.bamgrid.com)
GIVEN a user is on the Scoreboard Card View
custom_steps: WHEN a game is in a Final state
custom_expected:
THEN the "MLB.TV, "Audio", "Gameday", "Box" links will display under the game data
AND the MLB.TV link will play the home feed of the game
AND the Gameday link will open up Gameday for the game
AND the Box link will open up the Box Score in Gameday

title: Scoreboard Swiping
custom_preconds:
As a user I'd like to swipe the scoreboard from day to day so that move through the days in the schedule easier

A/C

Given the user is on the scoreboard

When a user swipes to the left on the scoreboard

Then the previous day on the scoreboard is displayed

And when the user swipes to the right

The current day is displayed

 

Given the user is on the scoreboard

When a user swipes to the right on the scoreboard

Then the next day on the scoreboard is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given the user is on the scoreboard

When a user swipes to the left on the scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the previous day on the scoreboard is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: And when the user swipes to the right

Given the user is on the scoreboard

When a user swipes to the right on the scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the next day on the scoreboard is displayed

title: Scoreboard Card View - Highlights Carousel
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/ANDROID-8752
As a user I'd like to see/play highlights on the Scoreboard Card View for a particular game

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given the user is in Scoreboard Card View
When the user navigates to the Highlights Carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: Display last five highlights of a game

custom_steps_separated.content:
Given the user is in Scoreboard Card View
When the user navigates to the Highlights Carousel
custom_steps_separated.expected: Display description of the highlight video
